title: Radish Carrot 🥕 Peas Pulav| Radish Rice | Lunch Recipe 👌
content:
Pulav Recipe: Radish Pulav Servings: 4 Duration: 30 minutes Pulao is a main dish usually prepared with rice, spices, vegetables, onion depending on cuisine. It can be prepared either with normal rice or basmati rice. I cooked pulao with Basmati Rice you can also cook with normal rice which is crystal sona masoori rice brand or any other brand as you w ish to have. In this Pulao main ingredient is Radish, they are high in nutrients and vitamins. I also added cashew nuts with spices gives you great flavour and good aroma 🍃 Health Benefits of Radish: Mainly, Pulao is mild spicy in taste & very delicious dish in India which can have either in lunch/ dinner and you can make this Pulao in less time… it is a quick lunch box pack or make on festivals Today I prepared Radish Carrot 🥕 Peas Pulao it turned out scrumptious food and best to try a new dish. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Basmati Rice 🍚 - long grain rice - 1 cup - 240 gms
  • White radish - Grated - 1 cup
  • Carrot - 1 cup
  • Green peas - 1/3 cup
  • White onion - sliced
  • Mint leaves - 20 - chopped
  • Coriander leaves - handful - chopped
  • Cashew Nuts - 12 pieces
  • Cloves - 2
  • Cinnamon stick - 1 inch piece
  • Green Cardamom - 2
  • Bay leaf - 1
  • Mace - small piece
  • Star anise - 1/2 piece
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Ginger garlic paste - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Green chillies - 4 - slits
  • Salt - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Cumin Powder - 1 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Coconut oil - 1 Tb sp ( you can use any cooking oil or butter)
  • Water - 480 ml
Procedure:
  • Wash basmati rice twice under running water and drain, keep it aside
  • Take a heavy bottomed pan or nonstick pan and put on over medium heat
  • Add cashew nuts, cumin seeds, cloves, Cardamom, cinnamon, bay leaf, Star anise and mace
  • Saute 1/2 minute, add green chillies and ginger garlic paste
  • Mix well and add sliced onions, sauté 2 minutes
  • Then Add grated radish and cook 5 minutes and then add spices such as salt, turmeric powder, cumin powder and garam masala powder along with green peas
  • Saute 30 secs and add chopped mint, cilantro and grated carrot
  • Combine well and add water, let water boil and add basmati rice
  • Gently mix and cook 10 minutes over medium heat and 10 mins on simmer. Sauté nicely in between 5 minutes
  • Turn off heat and make sure rice cooked well
  • Serve with Raita and crunchy potatoes 🥔 chips
  • Happy Cooking and have a good day 🙂
